name: TheAtlantic
text: "As every experienced federal prosecutor would immediately understand, Barr’s position violates Department of Justice lawyers’ training, their obligations to the court ... and the equal application of the law to all," @AWeissmann_ writes: https://t.co/9uaNq54DpK

name: TheAtlantic
text: "A great many people seem to think Trader José is just a little joke, rather than a bark of white supremacy," @JohnHMcWhorter writes: https://t.co/JNhXMtAUCj
